content: उत्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उद्-स्था-क] (Used only at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Born or produced from, arising, springing up, or originating from; दरीमुखोत्थेन समीरणेन <ls>Ku. 1. 8</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">6. 59</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 82</ls>; आनंदोत्थं नयनसलिलं <ls>Me.</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; <ls>Pt. 1. 274.</ls> {@--2@} Standing up, coming up or forth. --त्थः Arising, coming forth.
